Meta.title: TpRemoveUnhealthyHobby
Meta.author: TP@黒猫亭
Meta.description:
Residents will no longer have unhealthy hobbies (does not affect work)
If you delete the mod, the people will remain, but new people will not be affected after delete.
住民に不健全な趣味が発生しなくなります(仕事には影響しません)
MODを消しても人々はそのままですが、それ以降の新規住人には影響を与えません
